title: Ken Griffey Jr. | Ep 42 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | #StayHome with SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Ken Griffey Jr. | Ep 42 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | #StayHome with SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
Baseball legend Ken Griffey Jr. joins Matt and Stephen on episode 42 of All The Smoke to reflect on his Hall Of Fame career. Griffey talks about his home runs, opens up about injuries and discusses the steroid era. He also dives into Michael Jordans time in baseball.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
